methods.name: public boolean useDownloadId()
methods.comment:
* Gets whether download ID is used. * * If it's set to false, HAL will begin to send data before it knows downloadId and document * structures. * *

This query is only supported in Tuner 2.0 or higher version. Unsupported version will * return {@code false}. Use {@link TunerVersionChecker#getTunerVersion()} to get the version * information.

methods.name: public static Builder builder(@Filter.Type int mainType)
methods.comment:
* Creates a builder for {@link DownloadSettings}.
     *
     * @param mainType the filter main type.

methodNames: public static Builder builder(@Filter.Type int mainType)
